original_text: Rachel said to him, ‘Do not be angry with me, sir. I cannot stand up in front of you. It is the time of my monthly blood loss.’ So Laban looked everywhere for the idols, but he did not find them.
korean_text: 라헬이 그의 아버지에게 이르되 마침 생리가 있어 일어나서 영접할 수 없사오니 내 주는 노하지 마소서 하니라 라반이 그 드라빔을 두루 찾다가 찾아내지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: Do not be angry with me, sir
I cannot stand up in front of you
It is the time of my monthly blood loss
So Laban looked everywhere for the idols
but he did not find them
